dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare enter my domain, Shadow Conqueror? Prepare for the flames of hell to consume you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Bold words from a mere devil. Stand aside, or be extinguished.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Your arrogance amuses me. Let's see if you can back it up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will crush you and your kin without breaking a sweat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We'll see about that, worm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be eradicated!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bring it on, invader!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fall before my power, Azazel!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your power is nothing compared to mine!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The fires of hell are but a flicker to the dark magic I wield.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your dark magic is nothing but a trifle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Insult me again, and I'll roast you alive.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I'd like to see you try!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Return to your infernal pit, wretch.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will regret this day, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for your games. Move or perish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I will not move, not for you or anyone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you will meet your end.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Let's settle this once and for all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Foolish devil, your death is but a stepping stone.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Death will soon be yours!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Azazel, your reputation precedes you, but I have no quarrel with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words of a coward. Prove your worth or perish.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have defeated stronger foes than you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Empty boasts. Face me if you dare.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your end is nigh, Azazel!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare to burn, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate me at your peril.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Come then, show me what you can do.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek only to pass. Stand aside.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your pleas fall on deaf ears. Fight or flee.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not flee. Prepare yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good. I grow tired of waiting.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, but don't expect mercy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mercy is for the weak. Fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have an offer that might interest you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I doubt anything you offer can sway me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join forces with me, and we shall rule together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your offer tempts me, but I will not be swayed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Help me and gain power beyond imagination.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tempting, but I'll pass. Now, begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Leave while you can, Azazel. I spare you out of mercy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mercy? From you? Hah! I'll show you what mercy means in hell!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Undoubtedly, hell awaits you after I'm done.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We'll see who burns first!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Feel the wrath of my dark magic!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Taste my flames!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your demise is inevitable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You're about to find out just how wrong you are.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your overconfidence will be your downfall.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: And your arrogance will be yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's end this now, Azazel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: With pleasure!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be obliterated.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You first!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I could use a devil like you in my ranks.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tempting, but I serve no one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then face your fate.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bring it on, Shadow Conqueror!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loss. Die like the rest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Not today!
